cause.description:
This organization was created to raise awareness about the ongoing problems in the world, establishing the fact that the real world is not so different from the wizarding world. Genocide, poverty, AIDS, global warming, discrimination, and terrorism are only a few of the "dark arts" present in the world today.
1. Raise awareness about these issues that continue to cause suffering around the world
cause.mission: Fight the dark arts of the real world
cause.name: Harry Potter Alliance
